review: It has potential but compared to the Roku 3 ... well there is no comparison!  It is almost IMPOSSIBLE to easily find  and separate free content from content you have to pay for. I might as well have cable for as much as you'd have to pay to view content. I know it's an Amazon product but EVERYTHING is shifted to buy/watch/rent through Amazon. I already paid $99 for the set .. why do I have to pay another $79 for Prime content? I smell bait and switch ...
author: Darrell Gary

review: So glad to cut the cord from cable! I am saving a ton of money and there is programming for everybody in the house. I love this device.
author: Christine Lentz

review: It's heads and shoulders above my old Roku. The picture is clearer, I don't see the loading pauses I used to, and the icons, especially Netflix, now load completely and faster. I like the layout much better than my old Roku, and so far I can't find anything I watched with Roku that I can't with Fire TV. In fact, I see many more choices now.
